item.title: GitHub Copilot Agent Mode: An Intelligent Development Partner
item.description:
GitHub Copilot has introduced a significant advancement: Agent Mode. With this new feature, using the VS Code editor’s text interface, it can autonomously analyze, modify, and execute files in your project.

What is Agent Mode or SWE agent?

Agent Mode expands GitHub Copilot’s capabilities, transforming it from a simple code completer to an autonomous development assistant. The artificial intelligence can analyze, understand, and modify project files, as well as execute terminal commands.
